text.0: o soma being purified bring us the wondrous treasure meet.
text.1: for lauds that is in earth and heaven.
text.2: for ye twain indra soma are lords of the light lords of the kine.
text.3: great rulers prosper ye our songs.
text.4: the tawny steer while cleansed among the living bellowing on the grass.
text.5: hath sunk and settled in his home.
text.6: over the steers productive flow the sacred songs were resonant.
text.7: the mothers of the darling son.
text.8: hath he not purified impregned the kine whb long to meet their lord.
text.9: the kine who yield the shining milk.
text.10: bring near us those who stand aloof strike fear into our enemies.
text.12: soma bring down the foemans might his vigorous strength and vital power.
text.13: whether he be afar or near.
